body.name: Suave Deodorant Antiperspirant & Deodorant Stick 48-hour Odor and Wetness Protection Everlasting Sunshine Deodorant for Women 2.6 oz
features: Suave Everlasting Sunshine Invisible Solid deo and antiperspirant is anti-staining and protects for 48 hours
This antiperspirant deodorant provides long-lasting odor and wetness protection
Suave’s deodorant for women has an anti-staining formula stays on skin, not on clothes
Suave Everlasting Sunshine Invisible Solid antiperspirant protects with the delicate scent of passionflower and vanilla
This antiperspirant and deodorant stick goes on clear, so you feel clean and refreshed all day
Suave Deodorant for women is recommended for everyday use
body.description: Feel fresh from sunup to sundown and beyond! Suave Everlasting Sunshine Invisible Solid deodorant and antiperspirant is anti-staining and protects for 48 hours. Our women’s antiperspirant and deodorant stick provides long-lasting odor and wetness you can trust. So fresh and so clean. Suave’s deodorant for women has an anti-staining formula stays on skin, not clothes. This deodorant goes on clear, giving you underarm sweat protection without leaving any messy residue. The result: you feel clean and refreshed for 48 hours. Feel clean, smell clean. Suave Everlasting Sunshine Invisible Solid protects with the delicate scent of passionflower and vanilla that leaves you to feel fresh and confident for 48 hours. Want to try a new scent? Suave Invisible Solid, deodorants for women, is available in an array of fresh, floral and tropical scents. Choose from Fresh, Powder, Wild Cherry Blossom, Sweet Pea & Violet, Ocean Breeze, Tropical Paradise and Everlasting Sunshine. Find your favorite scent or choose a few! To use: Apply to underarms only. Enjoy long-lasting odor and wetness protection for 48 hours. Globally, Suave does not test on animals and is certified Cruelty-Free by PETA. For Over 75 years, Suave has offered professional, quality products for the entire family, which are proven to work as well as salon brands. The Suave mission is to make gold standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look good, smell good and feel good every day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Feel fresh from sunup to sundown and beyond. Suave Everlasting Sunshine Antiperspirant Deodorant provides 48 hours of odor and wetness protection with a vibrant passion flower and vanilla scent. Our clean and fresh deodorants with anti-staining formula, stays on skin, not clothes.

Anti-Staining Formula Apply without worry thanks to our anti-staining, anti-white mark formula. Exquisitely Scented Made with scents created by world renowned fragrance experts. Array of Fragrances Choose from Fresh, Powder, Wild Cherry Blossom, Sweet Pea & Violet, Ocean Breeze, Tropical Paradise and Everlasting Sunshine. Cruelty-Free We're proud that all Suave products are 100% Cruelty-Free.

Suave Professionals Sea Mineral Infusion Shampoo Suave Skin Solutions Aloe Lotion Suave Clinical Protection Everlasting Sunshine Antiperspirant Deodorant Main Benefit Suave Professionals Sea Mineral Infusion Shampoo makes hair easy to style for natural bounce, body and texture. Suave Soothing with Aloe Body Lotion is a body lotion with aloe vera that provides 24 hour moisturization. Get long-lasting, clinical strength odor and wetness protection with Suave Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Deodorant For Men!
reviews.reviewText: I grab at least one of these sticks with my monthly Subscribe ‘n’ Save order as they are just so darn good and highly effective.The stick smells of pineapple and coconut (but not in a cheap way) and provides the protection it promises on the label. It lasts surprisingly long and leaves me smelling fresh no matter what the physical activity.I also appreciate that it is not tested on animals but instead uses ingredients whose safety was ascertained back in the early 1900s.In sum, I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have been using for years!
reviews.reviewText: My underarms were red and irritated using secret, so I changed this this yrs ago and have used ever since. It is economical, and keeps you dry and still smelling fresh all day. It doesn't stain outside of shirt when pulling over head. This deodorant/antiperspirant is so great and works so well that even the 3 men in my family use it also. And that's saying something!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i love suave
reviews.reviewText: best value, smell and it works!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for my buck
reviews.reviewText: Its nice. I bought it because i ran out and had a trip. It had fast dilivery fine smell and lasts all day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell and works great.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this Suave deodorant for quite some time now, and it's great. This deodorant keeps me feeling fresh and confident all day long, thanks to its long-lasting formula. The scent options are subtle and pleasant, not overpowering. It glides on smoothly without any sticky residue and doesn't irritate my skin, even after shaving. Plus, it's incredibly affordable without compromising on effectiveness. Whether I'm hitting the gym or heading to a busy day at work, Suave never lets me down. It's a reliable and budget-friendly choice that I can't recommend enough for staying comfortably odor-free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was using secret paying almost $10 for it and my pits would burn realizing I was allergic 🥺. Used this one (cheap and smells amazing) and works great on my pits. I can go 12+ hours without smell/ sweat!!! So worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The description says unscented but it’s not. It does smell very nice, however. This is far less expensive that other brands and I cannot tell the difference. It keeps me dry and odor free all day.
